document.discussion_title: Swiss Money Supply Growth Accelerates In July
document.topic_text: Swiss Money Supply Growth Accelerates In July BRUSSELS (dpa-AFX) - Swiss money supply grew at the fastest pace since early 2015, the Swiss National Bank reported Monday.Money supply grew 2.7 percent in July from prior year, following a revised 2.3 percent rise in June. This was the fastest growth since January 2015, when M3 climbed 2.8 percent.Similarly, the narrow measure M1 moved up 2.3 percent annually, faster than the 1.4 percent increase in June.Copyright RTT News/dpa-AFX Sie erhalten auf FinanzNachrichten.de kostenlose Realtime-Aktienkurse von und mit der Push-Technologie von Wie bewerten Sie die aktuell angezeigte Seite? sehr gut 1 2 3 4 5 6 schlecht Problem melden
